overview: Ahmed and Ashraf are two friends who fall in love with the girl Salwa, but the problem is that Ashraf cannot tell her that directly, so he writes her a series of messages, and his friend Ahmed mocks him and asks him to call her, but he cannot, so Ahmed calls Salwa, and claims to be the author of the letters, They meet and Ahmed admires Salwa
title: Haza Oheboh wa haza Oredoh
